example.text: La semana pasada, el Partido Republicano propuso un proyecto de ley que profundizaría los desafíos que enfrentamos en nuestra frontera y separaría a las familias, en lugar de discutir los problemas con nuestro sistema de inmigración. Orgullosamente voté NO a HR2.

As an immigrant myself, I'm committed to finding bipartisan solutions to fix our broken immigration system. But the GOP's bill is not that. Today, I spoke against this inhumane bill, & called on my colleagues across the aisle to join us in finding real solutions to immigration. [[url]]

? I joined [[user]] to talk about what I'm pushing for in this year's Farm Bill – the legislation Congress writes every 5 years to support our farmers & ranchers, our nation's food insecurity programs, our agricultural researchers, & more! Listen?? [[url]]

The GOP is demanding negotiations on federal spending. Good news! Congress has a whole process for that, which we do every year! But failing to pay our bills on time would wreck our economy. Making demands at the cliff's edge isn't negotiation. It's hostage taking.
